heading: HB05171
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE POLICY FOR THE PROTECTION AND PROMOTION OF THE WELFARE OF OVERSEAS FILIPINOS AND CREATING FOR THIS PURPOSE THE DEPARTMENT OF OVERSEAS FILIPINOS AND THE OVERSEAS LABOR RELATIONS COMMISSION, DEFINING THEIR POWERS AND FUNCTIONS, RATIONALIZING THE ORGANIZATION AND FUNCTIONS OF OTHER AGENCIES RELATED TO OVERSEAS FILIPINOS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
